name: Cape of Eternal Justice
tooltip:
Cape of Eternal JusticeLevel 60

Bring 1 Qiraji Regal Drape, 2 Obsidian Idols, 5 Gold Scarabs and 5 Clay Scarabs to Keyl Swiftclaw in Silithus.  You must also obtain Revered reputation with Cenarion Circle to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Qiraji Regal Drape
- Obsidian Idol x 2
- Gold Scarab x 5
- Clay Scarab x 5
- Cenarion Circle:
